contentList.content: Deal an additional [1] and set your target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SEARING_SMITE">ablaze</LSTag> for [2] turns.
Evoke a heavenly flare and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDING_SMITE_BLINDED">Blind</LSTag> your target for [1] turns.

The <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> of Arcane Shots increase with your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.

This arrow always hits its target. The <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> of Arcane Shots increase with your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.

Ritually bound to its wielder.

The weapon gains the Thrown property, can't be knocked out of the wielder's hand, and automatically returns to the wielder when Thrown.

Gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> immediately and as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> on each of your turns until this spell ends.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> available as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.

Three creatures in the area gain [1] and have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. If hit by an attack, an affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on its next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> during combat.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with this blade have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against Lightly or Heavily Obscured targets.
Cover more distance this turn: double your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>.
